Lab.Description: A growing expectation of any cloud offering is the ability to automate the deployment and management of infrastructure components, like virtual machines, networks, storage, and databases - and enable customers to build and manage higher level applications on top of these in a rich DevOps friendly way. The Azure Resource Manager, provides a Language (Azure Resource Manager Template Language) that allows a declarative, parameterized description (a Template) of a set of related resources, so that they may be deployed and managed as a unit. The Templates are text-based (JSON), making it easy to use them with source code control systems like TFS and Git.
Lab.Title: Understanding Azure Resource Manager
